episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Andy Cohen looks back at the major pop culture moments from 20 years ago - from Princess Diana's tragic death to Mike Tyson's shocking bite in the ring. Talking with insiders Kristin Chenoweth, RuPaul and Rosie Perez, they'll discuss how 1997's obsession with Spice Girls relates to today's women's empowerment movement and more!

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Andy Cohen chats with friends Anderson Cooper, Joy Behar and Gayle King on the hottest pop culture moments of 2003 - from Beyonce moving on from Destiny's Child to Michael Jackson's outrageously-revealing documentary. Andy and his guests explore how "The Apprentice" led to presidency and how the Juicy Couture craze created today's athleisure wear obsession.

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Andy looks back at 1985, from Madonna's breakout year to the birth of Blockbuster Video. Andy and friends discover how the first WrestleMania influenced the current political climate and how the Live Aid concert inspired the charitable movements of today. Andy digs deep to uncover juicy, never-before-heard moments from his celebrity guests.

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Andy explores 1990 from Madonna's "Vogue" to Nelson Mandela's release from prison. Andy uncovers how Sinead O'Connor transformed the current face of beauty, and how Twin Peaks gave birth to today's golden age of television. Andy gets the dishy details on a major celebrity hookup.

5.title: Scandals

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Andy Cohen dives into the most talked about scandals of the past 30 years with celebrity guests RuPaul, Ali Wentworth, Robin Quivers and more. Andy reveals how the Hugh Grant scandal influenced today's celebrity apologies, and how the Lorena Bobbitt story changed the way women seek revenge. Plus, never before heard stories of the infamous Amy Fisher scandal from the woman who survived it.

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Andy Cohen relives the biggest pop culture moments of 1981 with Susan Lucci, Carson Kressley, Gayle King and others who were there. Andy and friends discuss how the reign of Dynasty on television created the Kardashians, and how the Reagans were first to coin "Let's Make America Great Again." Plus, your favorite housewives reveal their MTV video vixen pasts.

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Andy Cohen explores the pop culture moments of 2008. Andy and friends look at how Barack Obama's election led to our current political climate, and how the housing market collapse gave birth to today's sharing economy. Meghan McCain tells the never before heard story of the day Trump questioned her father's heroism.

8.title: Being Rich

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Andy Cohen dives into the opulent 1980s to explore how the wealthy spent their fortunes, and how that's influenced the ways the mega-rich spend their money today. Andy looks at how the gilded mega-mansions of the 80s created today's high-tech minimalist homes, and how the pricey plastic surgery of yesterday influenced the anti-aging treatments of today. Plus, the real housewives spill their pre-nup secrets!

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Andy Cohen revisits key events from 1994, including the O.J. Simpson trial, the launch of Amazon.com, the popularity of the sitcom, "Friends," the death of Kurt Cobain, and the adoption of the U.S. military policy, "Don't ask, don't tell."

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The year 1989 is recalled. Included: the birth of Botox; racial tensions; the year's exercise craze; the impact of AIDS on the art community; and TV's "House of Style."

episode of.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The year 2000 is remembered. Included: Y2K; the ".com bubble burst"; and TV's "Big Brother," "Survivor" and "Sex and the City." The season finale.

imdb.plot outline: The multi-part special will break down key moments of three significant years in history: 1989, 1994, and 2000. Andy will be joined by newsmakers, writers, and celebrity guests to discuss trends and events that made each of those years unforgettable, including never-before-heard insider stories from those who experienced the moments for themselves.
imdb.title: Then and Now with Andy Cohen
